Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15000. Considering the significant benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $14500. This is an excellent chance to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
